mapper.sql: id, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, record_id, player_id, money
mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT gmt_modified, group_no, record_id FROM record_detail WHERE is_deleted = 'N' AND record_id = #{recordId} GROUP BY group_no, record_id, gmt_modified) t order by t.gmt_modified desc

SELECT b.`name`, a.money, a.player_id, a.id FROM record_detail a, record_player b WHERE a.is_deleted = 'N' AND b.is_deleted = 'N' AND a.player_id = b.id AND a.record_id = #{recordId} AND a.group_no = #{groupNo} ORDER BY a.id ASC

SELECT a.group_no, a.player_id, a.money, b.`name` player_name FROM `record_detail` a, record_player b WHERE a.is_deleted = 'N' AND b.is_deleted = 'N' AND a.record_id = b.record_id AND a.player_id = b.id AND a.money > 0.0 AND a.record_id = #{recordId} AND a.group_no in
